verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
You so loved me
You came to save me
You gave Your life
To set me free
Now I love You
Love You forever Lord

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
And all I want
Is You in my life
Ev'ry day and ev'ry night
There's no way I'll ever
Get enough of You
More and more
That's what I'm livin' for
I want You in my life
